name: Somber Panic!
description:
A funny bunny wants to build a rocket. What for? Probably to go back to the Moon!

Controls:
W, A, S, D - Movement
Spacebar - Hit/Attack

This game has a timer, if you don't want that stress, there's an option to turn it off in the menu.

Game made for the Godot Wild Jam.

Credits:
Music: TulpaCharles

Programming and Art: Patera Bach

Sound effects from Zapsplat.

Unfortunately due to getting very sick I couldn't do everything I wanted to. But its still pretty alright.
